subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: With Lance Armstrong having retired, the path is clear for another American to make a mark at the Tour de France. Three contenders have the best chance to assume the mantle of top American rider.
snippet: With Lance Armstrong having retired, the path is clear for another American to make a mark at the Tour de France. Three contenders have the best chance to assume the mantle of top American rider.
